summary: A website for The Battery Warehouse - a dealer of Eastman inverters, batteries, and car/truck batteries at low prices
architectural_notes: E-commerce website showcasing Eastman inverters and batteries
Product categories: inverters, car batteries, truck batteries
Business address: Santi Path, AK Deb Road, Katabari, Guwahati, Assam 781035

existing_features.title: Create a homepage with header displaying 'The Battery Warehouse' branding, navigation menu, hero section introducing the business as a dealer of Eastman inverters and batteries for cars and trucks, and emphasis on low prices
Create a products section showcasing three main product categories: Eastman inverters, car batteries, and truck batteries, with imagery and brief descriptions
Add a pricing or value proposition section highlighting competitive low prices and affordability
Create a contact section with business contact information and a contact form for customer inquiries
Implement a footer with business information, quick links, and social media placeholders

Design the website with a professional, industrial aesthetic using warm, energetic colors (avoiding blue and purple), strong typography, and clean layouts that convey reliability and value in the automotive/power supply industry

Update the ContactSection component to display the owner name 'Raza', mobile number '7079860205', and email 'thebatterywarehouseghy@gmail.com' fetched from the backend in the contact information display area
Update the ContactSection component to display the business address fetched from the backend below the existing contact information (name, phone, email)
Update the ContactSection component to display the mobile number in the format 'Mob. No.7079860205' instead of just the phone number
Update the ContactSection component to display the email as 'gmail-thebatterywarehouseghy@gmail.com' with the 'gmail-' prefix
Update the ContactSection component to display the mobile number with the prefix 'Reg. Mobile No.7079860205' instead of 'Mob. No.7079860205'

new_feature_requests.summary: Add owner contact information: Raza, mobile 7079860205, email thebatterywarehouseghy@gmail.com

Update the backend ContactInfo type and getContactInfo query to return owner name 'Raza', mobile number '7079860205', and email 'thebatterywarehouseghy@gmail.com' instead of the current hardcoded placeholder values
Add business address: Santi Path, AK Deb Road, Katabari, Guwahati, Assam 781035
Update the backend ContactInfo type to include an 'address' field of type Text
Update the getContactInfo query to return the address 'Santi Path, AK Deb Road, Katabari, Guwahati, Assam 781035' as part of the ContactInfo response
Create a migration in backend/migration.mo to add the address field to existing ContactInfo data during canister upgrade
Display mobile number as 'Reg. Mobile No.7079860205' instead of 'Mob. No.7079860205'
Ensure email displays as 'gmail-thebatterywarehouseghy@gmail.com' with the 'gmail-' prefix
